014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.lang.reflect.Method;
018import java.lang.reflect.Parameter;
019import java.lang.reflect.Type;
020
021/**
022 * Interface used in conjunction with {@link SqlStatementCustomizingAnnotation} to generate
023 * {@link SqlStatementCustomizer} instances.
024 */
025public interface SqlStatementCustomizerFactory {
026    /**
027     * Used to create customizers for annotations on sql object interfaces
028     *
029     * @param annotation the annotation which lead to the method being called
030     * @param sqlObjectType sql object class (interface)
031     * @return the customizer which will be applied to the generated statement
032     */
033    default SqlStatementCustomizer createForType(Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType) {
034        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not supported for type");
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Used to create customizers for annotations on methods.
039     *
040     * @param annotation the annotation which lead to the method being called
041     * @param sqlObjectType sql object class (interface)
042     * @param method the method which was annotated
043     * @return the customizer which will be applied to the generated statement
044     */
045    default SqlStatementCustomizer createForMethod(Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType, Method method) {
046        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not supported for method");
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Used to create customizers for annotations on parameters
051     *
052     * @param annotation the annotation which lead to the method being called
053     * @param sqlObjectType sql object class (interface)
054     * @param method the method which was annotated
055     * @param param the parameter which was annotated
056     * @param index the method parameter index
057     * @param paramType the type of the parameter
058     * @return the customizer which will be applied to the generated statement
059     */
060    default SqlStatementParameterCustomizer createForParameter(Annotation annotation,
061                                                               Class<?> sqlObjectType,
062                                                               Method method,
063                                                               Parameter param,
064                                                               int index,
065                                                               Type paramType) {
066        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not supported for parameter");
067    }
068}
